name: slack-off
effect: Heals the user for half its max HP.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Slacks off and restores
half the maximum HP.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Slacks off and restores
half the maximum HP.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The user slacks off
and restores its HP
by half its full
HP.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user slacks off,
restoring its own HP
by up to half of its
maximum HP.
